pr_title: Adding diagrams for auth.md reference, update auth.md

timeline.message: Adding images for auth.md reference, modifying auth.md to reference the new images

timeline.bodyText: The numbering of the steps in the diagram is a little confusing because there are several items labeled as step 1. I would also consider changing the written login flow to use a) b) c) type numbering instead of actual numbers to avoid the reader thinking those written steps correspond to the numbered steps in the diagram. This comment applies to all 3 diagrams and corresponding written steps.
timeline.author: jkrogers18
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -88,8 +88,7 @@ The app ID and organization ID represent the mobile apps managed by an organizat
 _Note: Organization ID is a placeholder for future enhancements and not used for validation_
 
 ### Participant Login
-
-<!-- ![auth_mobile_login.png](images/auth_mobile_login.png "Mobile login diagram") -->
+![alt_text](images/auth_mobile_login.png "Mobile login diagram")

replies.bodyText:
In the diagram boxes, replaced numbers with bullets
In the diagram boxes, removed numbers when there was just one point
Could not change numbers to a,b,c in the written section as these are md ordered lists - which supports numbers only
Considered adding A, B, C to the diagram, but that cause issues in following the flow
Split the Validate Access Token into 2 sections - the new section refers to the refresh token flow. Added a new diagram to illustrate these 2 sections.
replies.author: ranjanirao20

replies.bodyText: Diagrams look really good. There is one typo is step 2 of the validate access token diagram - a space is missing in "clienttoken."
replies.author: jkrogers18

timeline.bodyText: The text in the auth box seems to be missing some commas or other punctuation
timeline.author: jkrogers18
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -117,14 +116,12 @@ Participants (mobile app users) are authenticated through the login method of th
 1.  A mobile app user is locked out of an account for 15 minutes after 5 incorrect password attempts  
 
 ### Participant Logout
-
-<!-- ![auth_mobile_logout.png](images/auth_mobile_logout.png "Mobile logout diagram") -->
+![alt_text](images/auth_mobile_logout.png "Mobile logout diagram")
 
 The mobile app sends a logout request to the Auth Server. The Auth Server then retrieves the access token from the request and clears the row in the sessions table, which has the access token.
 
 ### Validate Access Token
-
-<!-- ![auth_validate_token.png](images/auth_validate_token.png "Validate access token diagram") -->
+![alt_text](images/auth_validate_token.png "Validate access token diagram")

replies.bodyText: Fixed commas, punctuation and made some other minor language changes
replies.author: ranjanirao20

timeline.message: Fixed images, added a new image and modified text/sections in the auth.md document

Formatting in auth.md

Adjusted the "Password Handling and Rules" section from a header to normal text.

timeline.bodyText: maybe add some heading or formatting to make this stand out, e.g. ** for bold?
